updated_cases.title: Check that IP range for Source/User/Destination IP can be configured and properly applied to traffic.
updated_cases.custom_summary: Check that IP range for Source/User/Destination IP can be configured and properly applied to traffic.
updated_cases.custom_preconds: Altos should be enabled. SSL Decryption feature should be enabled.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Configure the SSL decryption policy
2. Send the traffic through either Client or GRE mode
3. See that the required policy is hit
updated_cases.custom_expected:
1. Default behavior of SSL decryption should happen
2. No errors should be reported
3. No crashes should be seen
